name: Repair Docks
desc: Deposit ships with D-Mods here to have them slowly repaired.

name: tempStorage
desc: Temp Storage. Don't fuck with this or risk losing all your shit.

name:
Requisitions
Centre
desc: Sells weapons of factions you have good relations with. Can be set to sell only weapons of a specific faction by having an Embassy on the same planet.

name:
Hull
Deconstruction
desc: Deposit ships to deconstruct for transfer onto a Forge Template here.

name: Engineering Hub
desc: Deposit ships for disassembly here, to gain progress on the research of a blueprint.

name:
Industrial
Supply Store
desc: Storage for buildings to take ressources from.
